entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NE 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or rain. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm near Lake Erie. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:35 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:35 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:35 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:35 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 5:35 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
